resources.string: What do I get if I apply?
Life insurance scheme by Government.Rs 330 per annum.\nIt will be auto debited in one installment.\nRs 2 lakh in case of death for any reason.
What do I get if I apply?
For accidental death and full disability of Rs 2 Lakh and for partial disability Rs 1 Lakh

Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojna (Prime Minister\'s Crop Insurance Scheme)
What do I get if I apply?
Crop Insurance Scheme to provide efficient insurance and financial support to farmers. It also covers local calamities.

Individuals whose Jan Dhan Account complrtes 6 months are eligible to obtain loans upto Rs 5000.

Ensure access to financial and banking services
Account can be opened in any bank branch or Business Correspondent outlet
Accounts can be opened with zero balance
also allows access to pension and insurance products
 Also covers Accidental Insurance of RS 1 lakh
Aadhar Card\nIf Aadhar card is not available then any other proof of identity like Pan card or Voter ID card
What do I get if I apply?

Financial Assistance is provided to patients,living below poverty line and who suffering from major life threatening disease,to receive medical treatment.\nNo upper limit has been fixed for availing financial assistance under RAN.

Application is prescribed format duly signed/stamped by the treating doctor and HOD and countersigned by the Medical Superintendent from the Government Hospital where the patient is receiving treatment.\nMonthly income of the patient.\nCopy of the BPL Ration Card.
What do I get if I apply?
The dispensary services including domiciliary care.
What do I get if I apply?
It is a government-backed pension scheme in India targeted at the unorganised sector.\nFixed pension INR 1\,000 or 2\,000 or 4\,000 or 5\,000 on attaining the age of 60.
Aadhar card linked to the bank account.\nMobile number to receive SMS confirmation.
What do I get if I apply?

NPS aims to institute pension reforms and to inculcate the habit of saving for retirement amongst the citizens.
The subscriber will be allocated a unique Permanent Retirement Account Number (PRAN).
This unique account number will remain the same for the rest of subscriber's life.
This unique PRAN can be used from any location in India.

What do I get if I apply?
Promotes entrepreneurship by providing loans starting from Rs 10 lakhs upto Rs 100 lakhs
Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship for College and University Students

The rate of scholarship are Rs 1000 at Graduation level for the first three years of college and University courses and Rs 2000 per month at Post\-Graduation level.Student pursuing professional courses would get Rs. 2000 per month in the 4\'th and 5\'th year.The scholarships would be paid for 10 months in an academic year
Grant in Aid Scheme for Voluntary Agencies

National Afforestation and Eco Developement Board NAEB provides financial assistance to Non-Governmental Organisation NGOs Voluntary Agencies VAs for afforestation,tree planting and eco-development activities under a Central Sector Grants in Aid scheme.
